trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletingRow"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
To cancel the deletion of a row in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletingRow> event handler, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消刪除的資料列中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletingRow>事件處理常式中，設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletingRow>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCancelEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCancelEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the `dataGridViewRow` parameter value to initialize the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCancelEventArgs.Row%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會使用`dataGridViewRow`要初始化值的參數值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCancelEventArgs.Row%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCancelEventArgs.Row%2A>

trans-unit.source: The row the user is deleting.
trans-unit.target: 正在刪除使用者的資料列。

trans-unit.source: Gets the row that the user is deleting.
trans-unit.target: 取得使用者要刪除的資料列。

trans-unit.source: The row that the user deleted.
